name: Bezas

guides.name: The Guidebook about Albarracin Bouldering & Bezas

overview: Bezas, nestled in the picturesque Spanish countryside, offers an array of sandstone boulders. This hidden gem is perfect for climbers seeking tranquility and a connection with nature. Bezas is most popular during the spring and autumn months.
